purpose: Provide a high-quality text-to-speech solution for developers and researchers
principle: Utilizes advanced machine learning models to convert text into natural-sounding speech
reusability: Offers APIs for easy integration into applications, supports customization of voice parameters
limitations: May require substantial computational resources for training and inference, limited language support
name: chatterbox
highlight: State-of-the-art open-source text-to-speech system with high-quality voice synthesis
